dependencies: Prebuilt container image yash5090/dinosaur:latest referenced by Kubernetes manifests (./deployment.yaml, ./service.yaml, ./manifests/app-deploy.yaml, ./manifests/app-svc.yaml)
CI tooling referenced in Jenkins pipeline: sonar-scanner/SonarQube, OWASP Dependency-Check, Trivy, Docker Scout, kubectl, terraform, awscli (./Jenkinsfile)
architectural_resources: Static web application served by Nginx container
Container image registry (Docker Hub) for pushing/pulling images (Jenkinsfile references yash5090/*)
Kubernetes cluster (applies deployment.yaml/service.yaml via kubectl in Jenkinsfile)
Kubernetes Deployment (replicas=2) running container image yash5090/dinosaur:latest (deployment.yaml, manifests/app-deploy.yaml)
Kubernetes Service type LoadBalancer exposing port 5000 (service.yaml, manifests/app-svc.yaml)
AWS Load Balancer integration implied by Service annotations (service.yaml: service.beta.kubernetes.io/aws-load-balancer-*)
CI/CD resources: Jenkins, SonarQube, vulnerability scanning (Trivy/Dependency-Check/Docker Scout)
